content.question: Directions: You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak. You are a foreign student in China, having a conversation with your Chinese teacher, Gao Lin, about a birthday party for an elderly Chinese neighbor that you attended this past weekend. Response 1
